com.percussion.search.lucene.analyzer
Interface IPSLuceneAnalyzer

All Superinterfaces:
IPSExtension
public interface IPSLuceneAnalyzer
extends IPSExtension

Lucene search engine analyzes content before indexing it. Analyzer is responsible for building a TokenStream. Lucene comes with several analyzers from contributors. This interface is meant to provide a way of adding analyzers for languages for which the analyzers are not provided by Rhythmy and override out of the box analyzers for a particular language. Implementers of this class are responsible for creating thread safe Analyzer for the given language. This class should be treated as a factory and the implementers should create appropriate analyzers based on the language instead of implementing this interface for each language separately. Extensions implementing this interface are strictly meant for getting analyzers while indexing and searching the content and not useful anywhere else and needs to be avoided.

Method Detail

getAnalyzer

org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer getAnalyzer(String language)
                                                throws PSExtensionProcessingException
Should create an instance of class that implements org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer and return based on the supplied locale.

Parameters:
language - The language string in the form of two letter language code hyphen two letter country code. For example en-us. The intended caller of this method is PSLuceneAnalyzerFactory
Returns:
An object of the class that implements org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer. May be null.
Throws:
PSExtensionProcessingException - if an exception occurs which prevents the proper handling of this request.
